name: CalFresh Outreach
description: Service provided by San Francisco-Marin Food Bank  in San Francisco.
fullDescription: Service provided by San Francisco-Marin Food Bank  in San Francisco.
whatTheyOffer: SF Marin Food Bank's Cal Fresh Outreach team serves low-income families, seniors, and disabled people who need food by providing the following: - Education about the Cal Fresh Program - Assistance with applying for Cal Fresh - Help with accessing Cal Fresh food stamps benefits Eligibility - A U.S. Citizen - Permanent Residents (green card), U or T visa holders, Refugees, and individuals seeking Asylum. - Meets household income CalFresh is a nutrition assistance service for low-income individuals
howToGetIt: How to Apply: - Call by phone or schedule an appointment online https://calfresh.sfmfoodbank.org/list/?_ga=2.46901028.2089775731.1650474956-1350688503.1647120997
